subject: Ghost Box Time Lapse Amplitude Recording method video
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Oh no... not another one of those UFO Geek How-To videos!
Yes.... I just made another one today.

Spiricomp/Ghost Box Time Lapse Amplitude Recording method using the 
Spiricomp (3 Radio Shack Hack, two 12-469, one 12-470, audio mixer, 
computer, and scanner recorder software.) How-to-video.
But this can be used with any number of Radio Shack Hack devices, even 
just one.

Video Link:  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lmFZFthAyuY

Try it out... if you dare... :-)

- Mike Coletta (UFO Geek)
http://www.ufomagazine.net
